exceptions.exn: In environment a : ad p : prec_list d : preDTA H : forall (a0 : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) a0 = Some p0 -> prec_list_ref_ok p0 d Unable to unify "forall a : ad, prec_occur ?M1859 a -> exists s : state, MapGet state ?M1860 a = Some s" with "prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true".

In environment s1, s2 : Map prec_list d : preDTA H : forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M2 prec_list s1 s2) a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d Unable to unify "forall a : ad, prec_occur ?M2709 a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s" with "(fix state_ref_ok_check (s : state) (d : preDTA) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ p => prec_list_ref_ok_check p d | @M2 _ x y => state_ref_ok_check x d && state_ref_ok_check y d end) s2 d = true".

original: intros s d H. unfold state_ref_ok_check. unfold state_ref_ok in H. destruct s. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. apply prec_list_ref_ok_check_complete. apply H. - simpl. apply andb_true_iff. split. + apply H. + apply H.
